Articles.Content:
Ok, This ship looks great, great design, the lunar lander has amazing amount of descent fuel,

but, I have alot of trouble at liftoff, it tends to go to a certain side, like, not equal thrust of some sort.

Does anyone know how to control it?

the video at the KSP website.

It has it\'s own functioning stabilization module.
